p: According to Table 2, the concentrations of 80 and 100 μg mL −1 presented larvicidal activity after 24 h, with a mortality of greater than 50%; the bioassay determined the LC 50 of 86.163 μg mL −1, with R 2 = 0.936. In 48 hours, EO presented activity at concentrations 60, 80, and 100 μg mL −1, the LC 50 of 76.524 μg mL −1, and R 2 = 0.923, resulting a high value when compared to the standard larvicidal esbiothrin, with an LC 50 of 0.0034 µg·mL −1.
